title: Talon is Currently Able to Cast R Mid-Q
body:
What he can do is basically throw out his W, Q to you, and ult while he's still in the air. This results not only in the first part of his ult hitting you, but also it's second part immediately converging to you. Furthermore, since his Q resets his auto, this all result in a pretty reliable combo to proc his passive. 

Now, I've been a Talon onetrick since S3, so I'm not saying this to complain about this champion being OP. Because he's utter shit IMO. But the point is, I don't know if this is intended, so it would be really sweet if a Rioter could clarify whether or not this will be fixed in the future. I'd rather just have this taken out of the game than to lose it AFTER getting used to the combo. Thanks in advance.

Edit: Be cool if there were a way to wave this in Rito's face once or a twice. Simple question with a yes or no question should be pretty easily answered.

Edit 2: 9 hours in, no official reply on what's potentially a bug report. I now want a refund of every single Riot Point ever purchased.
